overview: For her husband Robben, work is everything - and as the final  insult she gets a boring video camera for her birthday, to keep her occupied while he works overtime. In spite of this Wanja Decides to turn the disappointment into something positive. She decides to create ad erotic film site from a women's perspective. It's just as well to try the camera out at once! First up is her - while she touchers herself! She films a friend having sex with her boyfriend. Not to mention the newlywed neighbors. Or the horny stable hands in the hay loft. And she's off...
title: Wanja's Horny Summer
